title: Total global visitor traffic to Groupon.com 2019
yAxis: Number of unique visitors in millions
summary: Reddit is a web traffic powerhouse : in 2019 almost 42.5 millions visits were measured to the online forum , making it one of the most-visited websites online .
The front page of the internet Formerly known as `` the front page of the internet `` , Reddit is an online forum platform with over 130,000 sub-forums and communities .
The platform allows registered users , called Redditors , to post content .
gold: This statistic shows the unique monthly visitors to social couponing site Groupon from May 2019 to October 2019 . During the last measured month , almost 43.4 million unique global visitors had visited Groupon , down from 52.9 million visitors in May 2019 .
